abilities.title: The Powers of the Mind Mage
abilities.description:
1. Psionic Powers: Starts with mind block, see aura, alter aura (self), meditation, 3 each from healing, sensitive, physical, super (12 total); mind wipe, psi-sword, possess others at 3rd+. +2 lesser (healing/sensitive/physical) + 3 super powers/level (2nd+).
2. I.S.P.: M.E. base + 3D6x10 + 12/level. Master psionic.
3. Enhanced I.S.P. Recovery: 2 I.S.P./hr active, 12/hr meditating/sleeping.
4. P.P.E.: 1D6 base.
5. Bonuses: Save vs psionic 10+ (M.E. bonus), +6 vs mind control (drugs/potions/charms), +5 vs possession, +3 vs horror factor.
